EmailTemplate.description: To be sent to users who are missing their e-newsletters
EmailTemplate.name: Whitelist ISP
EmailTemplate.subject: Why am I not receiving the weekly e-newsletter?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
To guarantee you receive our newsletters, please contact your network administrator to add the following host addresses to your company's e-mail SPAM filter "whitelist":
Host / Address
mail6090.wilmington.mkt6689.com 74.121.53.240
wilmington.mkt6689.com 74.121.53.240
You will only receive e-mail from Compliance Week through those servers.
Best regards, Compliance Week
